name: Oprichniki Support Trooper

investigation.name: Fatui Oprichnik
investigation.description: A soldier encased within a Fatui war machine.\nUnlike their Skirmisher cousins, soldiers of the Oprichniki are formally recruited and rigorously trained. They are deployed either to the Fatui's most critical strongholds or thrown into the deadliest frontline battles.

description: A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a heavy shield and tasked to fight at the very front to protect their comrades.\nMany understand that in the long war between Snezhnaya and the dark calamity, only the side that holds out with greater resolution can outlast the other and emerge victorious. The ultimate resolution of the Oprichniki is, undoubtedly, the shield that protects their forces â€” so long as this shield does not fall, there is always hope for victory.
